snippet: The three men had exhausted their appeals, and the executions were the first approved by a court in nearly two years.
abstract: Three Palestinians convicted of murder are executed in Hamas-controlled area of Gaza less than a week after Hamas lawmakers order resumption of capital punishment.

byline.contributor: Majd al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza City.

lead_paragraph: The three men had exhausted their appeals, and the executions were the first approved by a court in nearly two years.

headline.main: 3 Palestinians Executed in Gaza Soon After Call by Hamas to Resume Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: Three Palestinians Are Executed in Gaza Soon After Call to Resume the Death Penalty
